body: Actually stopped fapping in the middle of it so i  could finish reading it

It was fine until the pseudo-intellectual stuff at the middle, like what? Just because you are aware of your surroundings doesn't mean you're going to be able dodge a person with superspeed? If the flash or quicksilver want to be punch you straight to the face, they will be able to, this is bullshit. And with that so apparent in my mind, I've also started feeling the effect of other stuff that I normally wouldn't mind. Like how did not a single person of the student council notice anyone sneaking up on them IN A GYM? The thing is clearly shown to be flat with no obstacles, not to mention it's not just one, bullshit. And how did the ability to "light thing up" ended up producing flashbang? Bullshit. This works on a team that just used real flashbang and has a person whose ability is EXPLOSION, bullshit. Also if their intents are to kill the Protag, why not just use their abilities, Also, what's the older sister plan to win in 1v1, fists? How is her ability going to incapacitate him?

Lmao @bigoking @lordcell you both ain’t got imagination. Plenty of great stories are straight up about the characters without getting caught up in the world. Final Fantasy, Persona, Etc. Also, it makes sense for the world state being what it is. Look at Toaru Index, Academy city has only its kids have powers, and it’s mentioned there only various, not all, schools for expers and that The sister and mother are the reasons why the MC and his school had shitty time. Also I’m pretty sure it’s not a BNHA literally everyone has powers, hence mentioning Toaru. It also makes sense For stealing virginities to be the power. 1, it’s hinted from the get go by having his status read virgins. 2, the symbolism behind taking virginities much like cliches over maiden/virgin blood in ritual or potions.

@DragonicCurry It's exactly why I can tolerate and read this one....and fucking wonder HOW THE HELL REDO OF HEALER IS AN OFFICIAL BONAFA MANGA! (well we do have a few Doujin's that found their way into being "manga"....god dammit "Isekai NTR") I seriously couldn't take that story seriously because I have too different mind sets when reading PORN like this story and reading Manga (if I wanted to fap, I'd look at porn), plus Redo Healer was everything I dislike in Manga packaged into one. Every story choice was edgy cringe and I can't let go of the "Rape brainwashing" in this setting, but Redo of Healer, I can't in anyway accept the justification for his relationship with Flare and her sister. Honestly plan to read it again once all chapters are translated because I started reading and have to finish....but I doubt I'll remember (I mean I can take INTERSPECIES REVIEWERS SEROUSLY AS A STORY! It's the only Manga in which "my Porn doesn't work like that" is an exception)

@bigoking yeah I agree with you on that, it's all over the place that the profiles at the end contradict what was seen in the story (like in a world where females are all powerful and men are second class citizens, how is the crappy "childhood friend" even able to get groped! You'd think no man would risk harsh punishment if caught doing that to a "precious" woman, or even there would be a way to detect that) also his ability to copy the powers of virgin makes little sense and felt like he got lucky (as otherwise who knows what his sister would have done when he raped her in CH1) frankly speaking the story would less "confusing" if it was written with the world in mind

Standing here, I realize you were
Just like me trying to make history.
But who's to judge the right from wrong.
When our guard is down I think we'll both agree.
That violence breeds violence.
But in the end it has to be this way.
I've curved my own path, you've followed your wrath;
But maybe we're both the same.
The world has turned, and so many have burned.
But nobody is to blame.
It's tearing across this barren wasted land.
I feel new life could be born beneath
The blood stained sand.

@Yourself Agreed, I only have a few EBA I like, this one, the other one (sister island) and the Idolmaster ones to name a few! I don't like "the other story" that's in this collection with the asshole older brother blackmailing and NTR his little sister (Sister Island is alot like this one abit, but I prefer this one over it). It reminded me of that other one EBA I think made that had the nerd older brother being oppressed by his gyaru little sister, but after the raping her to teach her a lesson, it's shown that he like the asshole in the story I mentioning brought it on himself! She caught him raiding and sniffing her panties, which made him a broken pedestal to her. Meaning her behavior to him early in the story was well deserved! I think it's because I like it when the girls "bring it on themselves" like this one and Sister Island. Can't stand the asshole wins trope sometimes! It gets old, cringy and unfappable (I can fap to GOOD doujin, bad ones...well I prefer reading their NENG)

@ZGundam64 I think Itami/Hibon made a doujin where the Fat Guy used the MC App to get revenge on his bully by using it on his equally bullying bitch of a Girlfriend, but at the end, Itami/Hibon added in the logic of "if you can use it and easily access it, then so can anyone else" as the bully gets instant revenge by using the app himself. Getting his GF back and beating him up! A sequel had him being more oppressed by the GF who is still pissed about the MC episode, so he decides once he gets it back to do her AND her mother...it ends with bully reversing it on him again, calling him an idiot for not learning the first time, but has GF and her Mom fuck him to a point he'll NEVER want to fuck a woman again! But yeah I always questioned why the MC Apps that aren't supernatural can't be used by the person who had his woman stolen to get her back and revenge. Hentai logic I guess....seriously their has to be a limit to abusing that! It's abuse like this which is why Mary/Marty Sue's reign
